languages.text: "О, шерин, с чего бы начать? С этого несчастного пустотнорожденного, которого выдают за ксеноса-эльдара? Или же вот этого судьбой наказанного мутанта, которого, кажется, выкрасили промышленным красителем... Право, сия выставка — памятник человеческой находчивости, но отнюдь не ксеноэкспозиция".

"Oh, shereen, where do I begin? With this wretched voidborn they're trying to pass off as an Aeldari? Or maybe this hapless mutant — I think they're covered in industrial paint... Truly this exhibit is a testament to the resourcefulness of the human mind, but it's certainly not a xenos exhibition."
languages.original_text: "О, шерин, с чего бы начать? С этого несчастного пустотнорожденного, которого выдают за ксеноса-эльдара? Или же вот этого судьбой наказанного мутанта, которого, кажется, выкрасили промышленным красителем... Право, сия выставка — памятник человеческой находчивости, но отнюдь не ксеноэкспозиция".

traits.locale_text: "Oh, shereen, where do I begin? With this wretched voidborn they're trying to pass off as an Aeldari? Or maybe this hapless mutant — I think they're covered in industrial paint... Truly this exhibit is a testament to the resourcefulness of a human mind, but it's certainly not a xenos exposition."

"Oh, shereen, where do I begin? With this wretched voidborn they're trying to pass off as an Aeldari? Or maybe this hapless mutant — I think they're covered in industrial paint... Truly this exhibit is a testament to the resourcefulness of a human mind, but it's certainly not a xenos exposition."

"Oh, shereen, where do I begin? With this wretched voidborn they're trying to pass off as an Aeldari? Or maybe this hapless mutant — I think they're covered in industrial paint... Truly this exhibit is a testament to the resourcefulness of the human mind, but it's certainly not a xenos exhibition."

"Oh, shereen, where do I begin? With this wretched voidborn they're trying to pass off as an Aeldari? Or maybe this hapless mutant — I think they're covered in industrial paint... Truly this exhibit is a testament to the resourcefulness of the human mind, but it's certainly not a xenos exhibition."

"Oh, shereen, where do I begin? With this wretched voidborn they're trying to pass off as an Aeldari? Or maybe this hapless mutant — I think they're covered in industrial paint... Truly this exhibit is a testament to the resourcefulness of the human mind, but it's certainly not a xenos exhibition."

languages.text: 「まあまあ、シャリーン、一体どこから指摘すればいいのやら…この虚空生まれの惨めなものをアエルダリに仕立て上げようとしているのかしら？いえ、不幸な変異体の可能性もあるわね…工業用塗料を塗りたくられてるんだと思うけど…人間の頭の柔軟さを表す展示ではあるようだけど、異種族の展示と言い張るのは無理があるわ」
languages.original_text: "Oh, shereen, where do I begin? With this wretched voidborn they're trying to pass off as an Aeldari? Or maybe this hapless mutant — I think they're covered in industrial paint... Truly this exhibit is a testament to the resourcefulness of the human mind, but it's certainly not a xenos exhibition."

traits.locale_text: 「まあまあ、シャリーン、一体どこから指摘すればいいのやら…この虚空生まれの惨めなものをアエルダリに仕立て上げようとしているのかしら？いえ、不幸な変異体の可能性もあるわね…工業用塗料を塗りたくられてるんだと思うけど…人間の頭の柔軟さを表す展示ではあるようだけど、異種族の展示と言い張るのは無理があるわ」

languages.text: “噢，亲爱的，我该从哪里开始说起呢？比如这个可怜的虚空之子，被他们用来假冒艾达灵族？还是这个不幸的变种人？我认为他们身上刷满的东西应该是工业油漆……诚然，这场展览让我看到了人类的足智多谋，但这肯定不是异形展览。”
languages.original_text: "Oh, shereen, where do I begin? With this wretched voidborn they're trying to pass off as an Aeldari? Or maybe this hapless mutant — I think they're covered in industrial paint... Truly this exhibit is a testament to the resourcefulness of the human mind, but it's certainly not a xenos exhibition."

traits.locale_text: “噢，亲爱的，我该从哪里开始说起呢？比如这个可怜的虚空之子，被他们用来假冒艾达灵族？还是这个不幸的变种人？我认为他们身上刷满的东西应该是工业油漆……诚然，这场展览让我看到了人类的足智多谋，但这肯定不是异形展览。”

languages.text: «Ay, shereen, ¿por dónde empiezo? ¿Por este nacido en el vacío que pretenden hacer pasar por Aeldari? ¿O tal vez por este pobre mutante? Creo que los han pintado con pintura industrial... Desde luego, esta exposición es un ejemplo maravilloso de la inventiva de la mente humana, pero no una de xenos».
languages.original_text: "Oh, shereen, where do I begin? With this wretched voidborn they're trying to pass off as an Aeldari? Or maybe this hapless mutant — I think they're covered in industrial paint... Truly this exhibit is a testament to the resourcefulness of the human mind, but it's certainly not a xenos exhibition."

traits.locale_text: «Ay, shereen, ¿por dónde empiezo? ¿Por este nacido en el vacío que pretenden hacer pasar por Aeldari? ¿O tal vez por este pobre mutante? Creo que los han pintado con pintura industrial... Desde luego, esta exposición es un ejemplo maravilloso de la inventiva de la mente humana, pero no una de xenos».

languages.text: « Oh, shereen ! Je ne sais même pas par qui commencer. Par ce misérable hors-monde qu'ils tentent de faire passer pour un Aeldari ? Ou peut-être ce pauvre mutant qui semble être recouvert de peinture industrielle... Cette exposition n'est pas tant une ménagerie de xénos qu'une démonstration de l'inventivité humaine. »
languages.original_text: "Oh, shereen, where do I begin? With this wretched voidborn they're trying to pass off as an Aeldari? Or maybe this hapless mutant — I think they're covered in industrial paint... Truly this exhibit is a testament to the resourcefulness of the human mind, but it's certainly not a xenos exhibition."

traits.locale_text: « Oh, shereen ! Je ne sais même pas par qui commencer. Par ce misérable hors-monde qu'ils tentent de faire passer pour un Aeldari ? Ou peut-être ce pauvre mutant qui semble être recouvert de peinture industrielle... Cette exposition n'est pas tant une ménagerie de xénos qu'une démonstration de l'inventivité humaine. »

languages.text: "Oh, Shereen, wo soll ich anfangen? Bei diesem armseligen Kind der Leere, das sie als Aeldari ausgeben wollen? Oder vielleicht bei diesem unglückseligen Mutanten – mit Industrielack gestrichen, würde ich vermuten ... Diese Ausstellung zeugt von der Raffinesse des menschlichen Geistes, hat mit Xenos aber gar nichts zu tun."
languages.original_text: "Oh, shereen, where do I begin? With this wretched voidborn they're trying to pass off as an Aeldari? Or maybe this hapless mutant — I think they're covered in industrial paint... Truly this exhibit is a testament to the resourcefulness of the human mind, but it's certainly not a xenos exhibition."

traits.locale_text: "Oh, Shereen, wo soll ich anfangen? Bei diesem armseligen Kind der Leere, das sie als Aeldari ausgeben wollen? Oder vielleicht bei diesem unglückseligen Mutanten – mit Industrielack gestrichen, würde ich vermuten ... Diese Ausstellung zeugt von der Raffinesse des menschlichen Geistes, hat mit Xenos aber gar nichts zu tun."

languages.text: "Ah be şirinim, nereden başlasam? Aeldari olarak yutturmaya kalktıkları şu sefil uçsuzdoğanlardan mı? Belki de bu bahtsız mutanttan başlamalıyım. Galiba üstüne endüstriyel boya atmışlar. Bu sergi, insan zihninin nelere kadir olduğunu gösterse de zeno sergisi olmadığı kesin."
languages.original_text: "Oh, shereen, where do I begin? With this wretched voidborn they're trying to pass off as an Aeldari? Or maybe this hapless mutant — I think they're covered in industrial paint... Truly this exhibit is a testament to the resourcefulness of the human mind, but it's certainly not a xenos exhibition."

traits.locale_text: "Ah şirinim, nereden başlasam? Aeldari olarak göstermeye çalıştıkları bu sefil uçsuzdoğanlardan mı? Belki de bu talihsiz mutanttan başlamalıyım. Sanıyorum hepsi de endüstriyel boyayla boyanmışlar. Bu sergi insan zihninin nelere kadir olduğunun muazzam bir göstergesi ama bir zeno sergisi olmadığı kesin."
